name: actorsapp-vue
description: A Vue.js based demo and portfolio web app consuming a backend Movie Actors REST API.  Built with Vue.js, Vite, TypeScript, axios, JSON, Bootstrap v5 CSS framework, HTML5, Bootstrap icons, Google Fonts, JavaScript, and CSS.  Have fun.
author: Ryan Hunter | GitHub handle: SystemsVanguard | Web: www.ryanhunter.org | Location: Toronto ON Canada
